description:
The pre-order / early-purchase bonus contains the following content.
Enjoy additional original content created by some great artists!

Each will be downloaded to the in-game "Museum".

Exclusive new illustrations by:
Chisato Mita
Yuri Kataiwa
Ryuji Higurashi
Tamio
SAKUTAMO

18 remixed music tracks by:
CAP-JAMS (8 tracks)
Knxwledge (6 tracks)
Mndsgn (1 track)
KEIZOmachine! (1 track)
Olive Oil (1 track)
Matt Cab (1 track)

Note: Bonus content is available to customers who purchase by 23:59 on Friday 30 September, 2022.
name: Exclusive new illustrations & music remixes
